FuncDef:
The set said-node disable command disables a specified SAID node or all SAID nodes.
The undo set said-node disable command restores the default SAID node configuration. The set said-node disable command disables a specified SAID node or all SAID nodes. The undo set said-node disable command restores the default SAID node configuration. By default, all SAID nodes are enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a SAID node.
The value is a string of 1 to 30  case-sensitive characters without spaces.
